name: The Adelaide Occasional Table
description: The Adelaide is the perfect choice for a room scheme that conveys soft, pared-back luxury with its soft curves and luxurious finishing. The circular top stands on a beautifully-smooth, tapered pedestal, while a sleek collar and stepped detail below add an elegant touch to the table. A facetted base, with four smart feet, rounds off this perfectly-proportioned and understated piece of luxury furniture.
